field.name: Counsel mother/caregiver to avoid harmful remedies
Advise mother/caregiver NOT to give cough syrups:
These syrups may sedate the child and interfere with feeding
They may also interfere with the child's ability to cough up secretions from the lungs
Advise mother/caregiver to avoid medicated nose drops (those that contain anything other than saline):
These might have similar side effects to cough syrups and can also be relatively expensive
